parameters.jsCode:
const body = $input.body;
return {
  id: require('crypto').randomUUID(),
  tenantId: body.tenantId,
  leadId: body.leadId || null,
  agentId: body.agentId || null,
  phone: body.phone || '',
  direction: body.direction || 'inbound',
  startedAt: body.startedAt || new Date().toISOString(),
  endedAt: body.endedAt || null,
  duration: body.duration || 0,
  status: body.status || 'completed',
  transcript: body.transcript || '',
  summary: body.summary || '',
  actionTaken: body.actionTaken || null,
  urgency: body.urgency || 'normal',
  sentiment: body.sentiment || null,
  notes: body.notes || '',
  recordingUrl: body.recordingUrl || null,
  tags: body.tags || []
};

parameters.responseBody: {{ { error: 'Missing required fields: tenantId, phone', success: false } }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO call_logs (id, tenant_id, lead_id, agent_id, phone, direction, started_at, ended_at, duration, status, transcript, summary, action_taken, urgency, sentiment, notes, recording_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ('{{ $json.id }}', '{{ $json.tenantId }}', {{ $json.leadId ? "'" + $json.leadId + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.agentId ? "'" + $json.agentId + "'" : 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.phone }}', '{{ $json.direction }}', '{{ $json.startedAt }}', {{ $json.endedAt ? "'" + $json.endedAt + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.duration }}, '{{ $json.status }}', '{{ $json.transcript }}', '{{ $json.summary }}', {{ $json.actionTaken ? "'" + $json.actionTaken + "'" : 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.urgency }}', {{ $json.sentiment ? "'" + $json.sentiment + "'" : 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.notes }}', {{ $json.recordingUrl ? "'" + $json.recordingUrl + "'" : 'NULL' }}, NOW(), NOW())
